tool.name: GDAL Translate

param.name: of
param.label: Output format
param.help: Select the output format. The default is GeoTIFF (GTiff). Use the short format name. http://www.gdal.org/formats_list.html

param.name: b
param.label: -b band
param.help: Select an input band band for output. Bands are numbered from 1. Multiple -b switches may be used to select a set of input bands to write to the output file, or to reorder bands.

tool.help:
The gdal_translate utility can be used to convert raster data between different formats, potentially performing some operations like subsettings, resampling, and rescaling pixels in the process.
http://www.gdal.org
http://www.gdal.org/gdal_translate.html
